homes.description: Beautiful historical house in downtown Union City, with ADU, total 2302 living sqft, 5 bedrooms & 4 baths; two of the bedrooms are suites. Completely renovated in 2018: chefs kitchen boasting granite countertops, plenty of designer cabinets, stainless steel sink, new dishwasher, gas stove & oven, hi power range hood.  New water heater installed in 2019.  Laundry room remodeled in 2024 with new washer and dryer. Tesla charging hub added in 2022.

Welcome to this stunning single-family home nestled in the heart of Tri-city. Boasting 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and additional studio versatile space, this residence offers a bright and airy open floor plan, accentuated by laminate flooring spanning approximately 1,140 square feet of comfortable living space. Step into the spacious living room featuring updated kitchen and bathrooms, complemented by dual-pane windows that flood the interior with natural light. Outside, enjoy the convenience of a porch, patio, and expansive private low-maintenance yard, perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests. With driveway access on both sides of the property, including RV parking, accommodating vehicles is effortless. Parking is a breeze.This home's prime location serves as a gateway to Silicon Valley, offering seamless access to Highway 880, Bridge 84, and Bridge 92.

This is a beautiful dream home, brilliantly designed, great layout, custom built by esteemed Rouse Homes. Step into grandeur through the  entryway, greeted by impressive staircase and dazzling chandelier. Entertain guests in style in the warm living room featuring a stone surround fireplace and stunning box beam ceiling. The adjacent formal dining room, adjoins a study room adorned with customer built-in cabinetry. The gourmet kitchen is a delight, boasting stone countertops, hardwood cabinets, walk-in pantry and modern appliances. Folding glass doors open to outdoor entertaining space with luxurious hardscape. The basement offers a secondary living space, ideal for relaxation and entertaining, featuring a bar, wine room, laundry room, and two spacious bedroom suites. This residence is truly a masterpiece of design and comfort.

Now priced to sell***Absolutely one-of-a-kind property! Nestled in North Palo Alto's sought-after College Terrace neighborhood! Completed in year 2024***Great value, lowest price per square foot in North Palo Alto neighborhood w/ an ultra-convenient location. We have dropped the price by $600,000; at this price, things will move quickly. Don't wait! This unique home boasts a total of 7 bedrooms & 5 full baths (main house 4 BR/3BA, 2,150 sqft. Attached Guest house 3 BR/2 BA, 1,000 sqft, inside laundry & separate entrance making the guest house perfect for use as a rental property). Details: wide-plank European white oak hardwood flooring, sunbathed kitchen w/ island, Azzurra Bay quartzite countertops, Thermador appliances, modern cabinetry, gas cooking range w/ 6 gas burners, faucets by Brizo Luxury & Hans Grohe, Sierra Pacific windows, Nest thermostat, & stone pavers in driveway & yard. Enjoy acclaimed Palo Alto schools: Palo Alto High, Greene Middle & Escondido Elementary schools.

Seize the opportunity to own this ranch-style home in a premium location! This long, cherished home in Santa Clara is ready for its next chapter. With a nostalgic charm, this property will transport you back in time, inviting you to infuse it with your own modern touches and make it your own. Boasting great curb appeal and a serene backyard for all occasions. Easy access to San Tomas Expressway, Lawrence Expressway, Central Expressway, Hwy 101, and Hwy 280. Nestled conveniently close to all that Silicon Valley offers, from shopping to recreational amenities like Warburton City Park, the Swim Center, City Skate Park and the Youth Activity Center. Plus, enjoy the advantage of being near major tech giants such as Apple and Nvidia.

Welcome to 131 Margo Dr, a contemporary townhouse style condo offering a blend of urban convenience and suburban tranquility in Mountain View. Situated in the desirable 94041 zip code and built in 1996, this newer construction boasts modernity and convenience. This south-east facing townhome features a lot of natural light and is a quiet corner unit with no units above or below. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an inviting living space featuring an open floor plan and abundant natural light. The spacious kitchen, with ample cabinets and counter space, is perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Both bedrooms offer direct access to the huge private rooftop balcony, providing a tranquil outdoor space for relaxation. Additional features include a walk-in closet and a convenient inside laundry.

Now its your Rare Opportunity to own a beautiful super bright home in Prime Ponderosa Sunnyvale! Beautifully remodeled and tastefully detailed 4b2b single family with private backyard oasis. Situated in the heart of Silicon Valley, near Apple, Google, just minutes away from vibrant downtown Sunnyvale & Hwy 101, 880. Property features spacious and bright living room and a separate family room with a beautiful cozy fireplace perfect for family gatherings, entertainment, vaulted ceilings and bright skylights, engineered wood floors throughout perfect to unwind and relax! Newly installed dual pane windows, recessed lights, remodeled bathrooms with skylights and functional cabinets. Newly installed dual pane windows, recessed lights, remodeled bathrooms with skylights and functional cabinets. All bedrooms are functional with recessed lights and engineered wood floors perfect for a family of 4!

Welcome to this updated, spacious home with beautiful details! You'll love the curb appeal with a crisp lawn, pleasant flowers, & new exterior paint. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by refinished hardwood floors that flow between rooms, new interior paint with stylish accent walls, recessed lighting, & large windows! Easily prepare meals in the modern kitchen with quartz counters & backsplash, stainless steel appliances, & pristine white cabinets. Both bathrooms are beautifully updated & feature stunning new vanities. Relax in the delightful backyard with a patio, verdant lawn, mature tree for shade, & pops of colorful flowers. Highly-sought-after location less than 0.5 miles to multiple grocery stores & restaurants; less than 1 mile to various public parks & the Public Library; & near major thoroughfares for easy commuting! Students have access to excellent schools in Vargas Elementary, Sunnyvale Middle, & Homestead High (buyer to verify)!

Enviably set in the heart of downtown Sunnyvale, this captivating 3-bed, 2.5-bath residence is a must-see! Towering trees, verdant foliage, and white picket fencing all lend to this delightful abodes storybook appeal. Fall in love with a bright, open interior where sunlight streams through expansive windows, filling the soaring ceilings over the fireplace-warmed living room. The kitchen is replete with stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry, a pantry, and gleaming countertops. Retire to the comfortable bedrooms upstairs, where the generous primary suite features bay windows, a walk-in closet, and a refreshing ensuite. Notables include a side patio and a large, built-in 2-car garage. With shops, restaurants, Caltrain, and other conveniences nearby, why wait? Come for a tour while this gorgeous gem is still available!

Welcome to this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bath Sunnyvale house on a large corner lot, within a short commute to Google, Apple, Meta, Amazon, Nvidia, and many other top Silicon Valley tech companies!  Enjoy abundant natural sunlight throughout, and a spacious front yard and backyard ready for your personal touch.  The living room with high ceilings flows naturally to the open concept dining area, and gourmet kitchen.  The home boasts an abundance of amenities, including central air conditioning and heating, new flooring, new kitchen cabinets, new quartz countertops and backsplash, new stainless-steel appliances, new interior and exterior paint, newer roof (2022), and much more!  Lakewood Park and the upcoming Lakewood Branch Library are within a 5-minute walk from your doorstep. Costco, Whole Foods, and the shops and restaurants of Santa Clara Square are all within a 5 minute drive.
